name: Battleship x Minesweeper - BRINESWEEPER
description:
This was a game idea provided by someone on my Discord server. It sounded funny, so here we are.

Also: HEADS UP!!!
There is no guarantee that your first click won't be a mine. That would have required any amount of forethought on my end. Instead, if you get unlucky on your first try, you'll just have to press the restart button. Sorry in advance!
